fragment: Referred to only as Cooper or Coop in the film.
The comic is a prequel to the film with Mann as the protagonist.
Thorne collaborated with Franklin and a team of 30 people at Double Negative.
Christopher Nolan and McConaughey made their first appearances at San Diego Comic-Con in July 2014 to promote Interstellar.
The teaser trailer for Interstellar debuted December 13, 2013 and featured clips related to space exploration accompanied by a voiceover by Matthew McConaughey's character Cooper.
